description: Submission of details in relation to condition 24 (Public Art) of planning permission 2019/2514 (as amended by 2021/2295 and 2022/2875).
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: <p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Condition 24 of 2019/2514 states:&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Public Art Strategy</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Prior to occupation of the development hereby permitted, a Public Art Strategy shall be submitted to, and approved in writing by, the Local Planning Authority, for the integration of art into the public realm, setting out processes for engaging artists and the community in the selection and procurement of an art work in strategic locations within the public realm of the site. The approved Public Art Strategy shall be implemented in full within 1 year of first occupation of the development.&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To enhance the public realm, legibility and the appearance of the development.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The submitted details have been reviewed by the Cultural Strategy Officer in the Regeneration Team who have commented that the details submitted are acceptable (referenced below).&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The submitted details satisfy the requirements of condition 35 of 2019/2514. The development shall thereafter be implemented and maintained in complete accordance with the approved details. The approved details in relation to this condition are considered to be.&nbsp;</span></p><ul style="margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0;padding-inline-start:48px;"><li dir="ltr" style="list-style-type:disc;font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;" aria-level="1"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;" role="presentation"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Woodberry Down Public Art Strategy Updated 2024 by Jeni Walwin (Submitted to LHB on 11th April 2024).&nbsp;</span></p></li></ul><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:700;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Conclusion</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-25d099fe-7fff-c09e-15eb-c548f24f446b"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:#ffffff;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The submitted details are sufficient to approve the application.</span></p>
